chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ expo m x y -> Iter_upb m x + Iter_upb m y <= ndN m

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
ndN = fix ndN (m : fmap) : nat := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 x _ _ => if exd_dec m0 x then ndN m0 else 1 + ndN m0 | L m0 _ _ _ => ndN m0 end : fmap -> nat
Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z) : fmap -> dart -> nat
disjs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ expo m x y -> disjs (Iter_orb m x) (Iter_orb m y)
disjs_orb_not_expo : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> disjs (Iter_orb m x) (Iter_orb m y) -> ~ expo m x y
not_expo_disjs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ expo m x y < -> disjs (Iter_orb m x) (Iter_orb m y)
orb_impls_expo : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> impls (Iter_orb m x) (Iter_orb m y) -> expo m x y
expo_eq_eqs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> expo m x y < -> eqs (Iter_orb m x) (Iter_orb m y)
impls_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> expo m x y -> impls (Iter_orb m x) (Iter_orb m y)
incls_minus : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ expo m x y -> let s := fmap_to_set m in let sx := Iter_orb m x in let sy := Iter_orb m y in incls sy (set_minus s sx)
eqs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m x y -> eqs (Iter_orb m x) (Iter_orb m y)
card_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> card (Iter_orb m x) = Iter_upb m x
exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
period_expo : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> Iter_upb m z = Iter_upb m t
incls_rem : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (Iter_rem m x) (fmap_to_set m)
incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
upb_eq_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter_upb m z = degree m z
period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter_upb m z = Iter_upb m (Iter (f m) i z)
degree_bound : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> degree m z <= ndN m
L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
expo_exd : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> exd m t
L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := Iter_rem m z in let nr := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | i < nr /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) nr z = z
upb_pos : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> 0 < Iter_upb m z
expo1_ex_j : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in ex_j m z t (p - 1) < -> expo1 m z t
PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
expo_eq_exds_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expo m z t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
PL3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
exds_rem_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m t -> ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z)
exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> diff_orb m z

```coq
```coq
intros m x y Hm Hx Hy Hxy.
induction Hxy as [| m0 x0 k0 x1 IH].
- simpl. apply le_n.
- simpl. apply lt_n_S.
  apply (le_trans (_ + _)).
  ++ apply IH.
     apply disjs_orb. assumption.
     assumption.
     apply not_expo_disjs_orb. assumption.
     assumption.
     assumption.
  ++ apply plus_le_compat_r.
     apply upb_eq_degree. assumption.
     assumption.
     assumption.
     apply degree_bound. assumption.
     assumption.
Qed.```
